metadata.title: Thursday, 12th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the construction of township roads in Mkushi District will be completed;
(b)    whether the works will be completed as scheduled and, if not, why; and
(c)    who the contractor for the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a)    when the construction of the palace for Chieftainess Mboanjikana at Libonde Royal Village in Liuwa Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the construction works; and

(c)    when rehabilitation of palaces for other traditional leaders in the Western Province will commence. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W11    Mr Mbewe (Chadiza) - to ask the Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry:
(a)    what Zambia’s total exports from 2011 to 2014 were, year by year;
(b)    to which countries the exports were made;
(c)    what type of products were exported; and
(d)    what challenges, if any, Zambian exporters encounter in entering export markets.
